table.name: pricebookproductrelno
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_pricebookproductrel` ADD `pricebookproductrel_no` varchar(56) default NULL FIRST;

table.name: pricebookproductrelindex
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_pricebookproductrel` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD INDEX `pbpdo` (`pricebookid`, `productid`) USING BTREE;

table.name: pricebookproductrelprimary
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_pricebookproductrel` ADD `pricebookproductrelid` INT NOT NULL FIRST;

table.name: vtiger_pricebookproductrelcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pricebookproductrelcf` ( `pricebookproductrelid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pricebookproductrelid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
